scripts.build:image: docker build -f scripts/app/Dockerfile -t registry.heroku.com/holo-back/web:$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) --target=app .
scripts.build:tag: docker tag registry.heroku.com/holo-back/web:$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) registry.heroku.com/holo-back/web:latest
scripts.deploy: yarn deploy:login && yarn deploy:push && yarn deploy:release
scripts.goose: docker-compose -f scripts/tool/docker-compose.yaml run tool goose -dir sql postgres 'host=db port=5432 user=holo password=password sslmode=disable'
